Local residents in need of assistance with their energy and water bills can now turn to Hastings Furniture Service's store located in the Priory Meadow area. The initiative aims to provide much-needed support to individuals struggling with these essential expenses, offering a range of resources and advice tailored to help manage costs effectively.

The service is part of broader efforts by community organizations and local businesses to alleviate financial pressures affecting many families during challenging economic times. Interested individuals are encouraged to visit the store or contact Hastings Furniture Service for more information on how they can benefit from this free resource.
